I have read, understand and I agree to \nVerificate Privacy Policy and Terms and \nconditions You\'re about to go offline. This means you will \n not be assigned addresses by our team and all \n your pending addresses will be reassigned to \n other agents. Are you sure about this? We will process it securely to verify your \nidentity and keep your account safe NB: Make sure we can see your face clearly, so we can match you to your photo ID.\n match your photo ID
We need location permission to locate your position.
We need camera permission to take your picture.
We need contact permission to pick a number.
We can\'t get your location without location permission.
We can\'t take your picture without camera permission.
We can\'t get your contacts without contact permission.
